Reason.en_US: Securely back up everything with Duplicati. Stay tuned for a full video walkthrough deep dive!
Incredible feature packed (and free) media server for all of your needs!
Make every watt count on your Unraid server
Allows you to run quick scripts to performance maintenance or automation tasks on your server
Brings even more ZFS magic to the Unraid GUI
Lightweight swiss-knife-like VPN client
Nginx Proxy Manager enables you to easily forward to your websites running at home or otherwise, including free SSL, without having to know too much about Nginx or Letsencrypt.
Publish data from your unraid server to mosquitto so in can be tracked within Home Assistant and more

Tailscale⁠ lets you connect your devices and users together in your own secure virtual private network. Tailscale enables encrypted point-to-point connections using the open source WireGuard⁠ protocol.
Helps find errors or configuration mistakes with your server
If you habitually use a browser full size on an ultra-wide / 4K monitor nothing beats this
A great customizable landing page for all your websites, docker containers etc
Enables and runs trim on your XFS formatted SSDs (Not required for BTRFS)
A nice virus checker for all the files on your server
Easily re-encode your media to h.265 to save space on your array with minimal quality loss
Help join the fight against COVID-19
An integral part of the Ultimate Unraid Dashboard project
Nothing beats being able to play your own music collection on your Alexa device
Allows your docker containers to take advantage of a non-passed through nVidia GPU for transcoding, computation etc
Securely access your server remotely and more!
Easily backup your files to cloud based storage. Walk Through Video
A great system wide dashboard with no setup required
Allows you pause and resume parity checks of your array to only run when the server is idle
Helps keep your server secure by displaying the strength of the passwords you've chosen
The #1 trending app with over 370k downloads is mediagoblin: the decentralized, roll your own, media publishing platform
Reason.de_DE: Die Nummer 1 unter den Trend-Apps mit über 370.000 Downloads ist mediagoblin: Die dezentrale, eigene Medien-Publishing-Plattform

Reason.en_US: With over 214k downloads this month, languagetool can make use of large n-gram data sets to detect errors with words that are often confused in over 20 languages!
Reason.de_DE: Mit über 214.000 Downloads in diesem Monat, languagetool kann große n-gram Datensätze nutzen, um Fehler mit Wörtern zu erkennen, die in über 20 Sprachen oft verwechselt werden!

Reason.en_US: With over 10k downloads this month, Enpass is August's CA Monthly Spotlight.
Reason.de_DE: Mit über 10.000 Downloads in diesem Monat ist Enpass das CA Monthly Spotlight im August.

Reason.en_US: With an eye-popping 45% monthly downloads growth, Boinc is September's most popular container.
Creates a nice landing page for all of your docker containers with no work involved
Sends Alerts/Notifications from my Wifi enabled LG Washer and Dryer to my phone and other home automation components
A fully automated, accurate, and extensive scanner for finding vulnerable log4j hosts
Easily and automatically backup your GitHub account to your Unraid server
Preclear your disks for confidence in their reliability, use as a hot spare etc
Host your own Rickrolls for April Fools Day
By popular demand, a file manager to manage all of your files on your server.
Easily benchmark your drives, find bottlenecks etc
Save TB of disk space by converting your media library to x265. Also watch the video
TeslaMate is a powerful, self-hosted data logger for your Tesla.  Also checkout the companion app TeslaMate-Grafana
Ghostfolio is an open source wealth management software that empowers busy people to keep track of stocks, ETFs or cryptocurrencies and make solid, data-driven investment decisions.
This is a clone project of the popular word guessing game we all know and love: Wordle. Made using React, Typescript, and Tailwind.
The Tips and Tweaks plugin allows you to adjust some NIC parameters, disk caching, CPU usage and other tweaks.
Cloud backups done right! Duplicacy backs up your files to many cloud storages with client-side encryption and the highest level of deduplication.

Unmanic is a simple tool for optimizing your file library with a highly customizable plugin system. Remove the complexity of automatically converting your file library and simply point Unmanic at your library and let it manage it for you.
Wikijs A modern, lightweight and powerful wiki app built on NodeJS.
Set up a RetroNAS VM in minutes!
Kavita is a rocket-fueled self-hosted digital library that supports a vast array of file formats for your books, comics, and graphic novels.
Easy and simple WebUI for your existing Calibre ebook library

Easily manage your Unifi network.  Note that the default :latest container may have issues from time to time.  Check with the support thread or LSIO's discord site if you have issues and how to tag the container to a specific version
Simplify the management of your server with Homarr - a sleek, modern dashboard that puts all of your apps and services at your fingertips

Trying to find a setting within the WebGUI but just can't find it?  GUI Search let's you enter in a search term for the setting (in either English or the language you have set the GUI to run in) and will automatically take you to the appropriate page with the setting highlighted on supported browsers
The replacement for Docker Folders, this plugin lets you easily group your installed Docker Applications into folders on the Docker tab to simplify management
Keep backups of your appdata for docker containers.  Selectively restore them in case of a drive failure or a failed update etc.  Highly recommended
Host your own picture library.  Almost a hybrid between Imgur and Pastebin
MineOS is a server front-end to ease managing Minecraft administrative tasks.
Easily balance (or unbalance) the files in your array between drives
Easily set up your own cloudflare tunnel
Self host your own photos and videos

Mealie is an intuitive and easy to use recipe management app. It's designed to make your life easier by being the best recipes management experience on the web and providing you with an easy to use interface to manage your growing collection of recipes.
Easily backup (on a schedule) the appdata from all of your docker applications in case of disaster recovery, updates gone wrong etc
Run memory tests without having to reboot your server
Create your own tabs on the GUI of your server. See this video for how to run your own scripts right from the tabs!
Powerful and easy to use eBook manager.  A must have
